short_summary: Procurement Notice: Individually Ventilated Caging (IVC) Systems for Public Health Agency of Canada
description: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)", as the contracting entity, is issuing this notice as part of their ongoing procurement processes.
full_summary:
### Individually Ventilated Caging (IVC) System Solicitation

#### Solicitation Details:
* **Solicitation Title:** 6D063-235242 Individually Ventilated Caging (IVC) System
* **Reference Number:** WS4544737862-Doc4586018943
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4544737862
* **Publication Date:** May 28, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 10, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** June 24, 2024

#### Solicitation Type:
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Contract Details:
* **Contracting Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Agency Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **End User Agency:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)
* **End User Agency Address:** 130 Colonnade Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9

#### Contact Information:
* **Contact Name:** Gerlie Ramos (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [gerlie.ramos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gerlie.ramos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Solicitation Description:
Canada is seeking offers from qualified suppliers to provide Individually Ventilated Caging (IVC) Systems for the Public Health Agency of Canada in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The solicitation is for the supply and delivery of IVC Systems.

**Note:** The tender closing date has been amended to July 10, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by the specified deadline. Late bids will not be accepted.

Please find the solicitation details on Ariba Discovery at: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19845532](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19845532)
